title: Right in the heart of Center City Philadelphia
description:
Right in the heart of Center City Philadelphia, you will find this furnished GEM! This cozy, fresh and fly furnished apartment has everything you could possibly need - all you need is a suitcase and some groceries!!! On the first floor you'll find the cozy comforts of home with tastefully done artwork and touches all throughout. All the appliances are sized to be used and enjoyed (read: no dorm room sized refrigerator, for instance) and although a laundromat is a couple blocks away, you won't need to round up quarters because the dual washer/dryer will handle that! The first floor also boosts a little outside nook for when you need to get air without sitting on a stoop and to grow your fresh herbs or whatever you prefer! A snazzy spiral staircase takes you up to the second floor where your queen sized bed, flat screen TV and nicely updated bathroom await you. Don't want to take the spiral route? For those long days when you just need to crash, you can bypass that and take the staircase in the foyer right to your second floor door. It could not be more convenient! As for the location? Groceries, restaurants, entertainment, transportation.... just EVERYTHING is right outside the door! Here you can have the best of both worlds; a beautiful, cozy, quiet furnished home on the inside and a city rich in culture and diversity with convenience galore on the outside. Win, win!

title: This is an amazing home located on a quiet block
description:
This is an amazing home located on a quiet block in the heart of Northern Liberties, just around the corner from the Piazza and Liberties Walk, and steps away from dozens of neighborhood restaurants including Apricot Stone, El Camino Real, Hikari Sushi and Urban Village Brewing Company. Upon entering you will notice the open and inviting floor plan. The first floor has hardwood flooring, high ceilings , a bathroom, a gas fireplace, and a piano. Light pours through the kitchen from the backyard through a glass door that leads to an outdoor city oasis, including a patio AND grass! The basement has a custom bar and pool table for entertaining. Venturing upstairs to the 2nd floor, you will find a cozy back bedroom and large front bedroom with a renovated bathroom, a front-loading washer and dryer, and large walk-in closet. The 3rd floor features a large home office that could double as an extra bedroom. French doors open into the primary bedroom, which boasts large closet space, hardwood flooring, and a fully renovated bath with dual shower heads. The home is full of character, with custom built-ins and solid wood doors, and has been featured in Design Home, Nest, Apartment Therapy, and Philadelphia Magazine. The home has a nest thermostat and ADT security set up. There is permit parking on the block, neighborhood favorite One Shot Cafe on the corner, and both Heirloom Market and Acme only a block away!

title: Right in the heart of Center City Philadelphia
description:
Right in the heart of Center City Philadelphia, you will find this furnished GEM! This cozy, fresh and fly furnished apartment has everything you could possibly need - all you need is a suitcase and some groceries!!! On the first floor you'll find the cozy comforts of home with tastefully done artwork and touches all throughout. All the appliances are sized to be used and enjoyed (read: no dorm room sized refrigerator, for instance) and although a laundromat is a couple blocks away, you won't need to round up quarters because the dual washer/dryer will handle that! The first floor also boosts a little outside nook for when you need to get air without sitting on a stoop and to grow your fresh herbs or whatever you prefer! A snazzy spiral staircase takes you up to the second floor where your queen sized bed, flat screen TV and nicely updated bathroom await you. Don't want to take the spiral route? For those long days when you just need to crash, you can bypass that and take the staircase in the foyer right to your second floor door. It could not be more convenient! As for the location? Groceries, restaurants, entertainment, transportation.... just EVERYTHING is right outside the door!
